1543311.content:
"Thank you very much Las Vegas, Nevada!" The starlit female songwriter cheered into the microphone. As the headliner for tonight's concert at the casino, everyone had eagerly awaited her performance. And she didn't disappoint. Being on the cusp of yet another breakup gave her plenty of new material to write about.

Yes, Taylor Swift was at the pinnacle of the pop music world. Bathed in the blinding stage lights as well as the applause of thousands of adoring fans, she bowed before her audience:

https://imgur.com/tf1IEPT

Several pyrotechnics flared out in a dazzling display. Purple and blue smoke flowed out onto the stage and covered her exit, along with the rest of the band.

Backstage, she hugged her current boyfriend, who had come to greet her with a large bouquet of roses.

"You were wonderful, baby." He whispered into her neck. They kissed, and he traced his hand down to hers. "Do you mind if we talk for a moment out back? It's kind of important."

Taylor swept her blonde bangs out of her eyes. "Of course, honey. I'll always have time for you."

"Yes, so the song goes." He smiled warmly. She thanked her fellow band mates and stagehands for another successful performance before following her boyfriend out to an alley behind the casino.

It's a warm August evening. As usual for the Las Vegas strip, it's an endless cacophony of honking taxicabs, slot machine spins, and street performers. But Taylor and her boyfriend were alone and undisturbed behind the casino after the concert.

"So what do you want to talk about?" Taylor asked expectantly.

"We need to talk about us," Her boyfriend said. He kicked a stone along the ground, gathering up the nerve to speak. "I really, really like you, Taylor. These last three weeks have been the best of my life without exception." He scratched the back of his neck.

But she could tell by his tone that something was wrong. "But... ?"

He exhaled. "Wow. I didn't think saying this would be so difficult."

They looked into each other's eyes, he searching for the courage and she searching for his answer.

Finally, he confessed, "Taylor, what we have together is working. We just get along too well. We have so much in common. I don't want this relationship to end."

Taylor's expression fell. "Oh."

He continued, "What I'm trying to say to you is... let's not break up."

She looked crestfallen. "But what about my career? People don't listen to my songs about happy, functional relationships! They need breakups. So I need breakups."

"I know this is hard, but we'll get through this together." He said, holding her hand and looking into her eyes.

"That's exactly the problem!" She said, tears forming in her eyes. "Why do you always answer my text messages? Why are you there for me when I need you?"

"Do you want me to leave you alone tonight?" He asked.

She wiped her eyes. "It doesn't work like that. I have to be the one to ask you to stay with me, then you have to leave me behind in confusion and heartbreak. I mean, didn't you listen to my album?"

"Which one was that?"

"All of them!" She threw up her hands. He placed his arms around her, comforting her as she placed her head on his shoulder.

"You can write different songs. Better songs! And they can come from the heart just like the old ones did." He said, admiring Taylor's youthful physique.

"Can't you at least call me a failure?" She asked at last. "Fine then, but I need to be alone for a while."

He understood and, kissing her passionately, went backstage to rejoin the crew. Taylor sat down on a bench and bawled her eyes out.

Unbeknownst to her, a purple-robed magician wearing a top hat approached her and sat down next to her. This man wore a black mask that resembled something out of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. He was clean shaven, tall, and carried a ruby-encrusted cane with him. Everything about him conveyed an aura of mystery.

He cleared his throat, then spoke in a deep voice. "Why are you crying, young lady?"

Taylor noticed the man sitting cross-legged next to her. "Don't you know who I am?"

"Of course," He replied coolly. "You are Taylor Swift, the famous singer. You headlined a concert at that casino over there tonight. You're crying because your boyfriend didn't break up with you. You think you need a constant stream of emotional turmoil in order to write new songs for your fans."

She was amazed by how much he knew. Was he another stalker?

"I'm not here for an autograph," The man said, spitting out the last word in disgust. "I'm here to grant you what you want."

"And what is it that I want?" Taylor asked.

"You want what all celebrities want, at some point in their careers." The man explained. "A reprieve from the usual. The expected. You want to try something new, don't you? Well, I have something interesting in mind for you, that is, if you follow me this way."

Against her better judgment, Taylor decided to follow the masked man. "Are you a magician?" She asked, after a few minutes of walking along the Vegas strip.

"Indeed." He replied. "Do you see all of these people we're passing? Normally they would be mobbing you, bugging you for attention and photos with them, wouldn't they? I cast a spell over both of us so that we would not be recognised."

She had no choice but to believe him. "What's your name?"

"My name is for my closest friends only." He said coldly, "But you can call me by my stage name, Cosmo the Conjuror."

"That's what I meant..." She murmured. "Are you new in town? I'm sorry I'm not familiar with your act."

"I've been here for quite some time now," Cosmo replied. "But I don't do commercial. My works are limited only to those who I select personally."

"Fair enough," Taylor walked with him in silence for a few minutes more until they reached a nondescript building next to Fremont Street. Strangely, Fremont Street was dark and quiet with nobody around. Normally, this place north of the Vegas strip would be teeming with all sorts of strange and unique characters, like a circus without the big tent.

"I've never seen it so desolate here before, especially at this time of night." Taylor shivered. It was a lot colder now than just a few minutes ago as well.

"Welcome to my stage... Taylor Swift!" Cosmo swept wide his arms. All the streetlights and buildings in downtown Las Vegas disappeared in a puff of smoke. The ruby atop his cane shined brightly, and Taylor slumped onto the ground asleep.

Little did Taylor Swift know... the masked magician had an otherworldly power to swap peoples' heads around. But she would soon discover this first hand!

***


Taylor Swift awoke to laughs and jeers from a strange audience. Staring out into a small showroom, there were about 60 to 70 shadowy figures seated at tables, sipping drinks while Cosmo the Conjuror carried on with his show. Taylor tried to move, but found that her body was gone!

Looking down in astonishment, she saw a wooden stage and a pedestal, atop which her head was perched.

"WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON HERE???" She shrieked.

"Ladies and gentlemen, friends and honoured guests... our volunteer is awake!" Cosmo announced to a thunderous applause. "Now we can begin my favourite act of the evening."

Taylor tried not to cry as Cosmo continued, "Our guest tonight was just told that her boyfriend would NOT be breaking up with her. Truly a faithful fellow. Everyone, please welcome Taylor Swift's current boyfriend!"

The young man strode out onto the stage. Taylor couldn't believe it. Did he plan all of this, or was he abducted just like her?

He introduced himself to the audience and made it clear he didn't like that his girlfriend's body was taken from her.

"I understand your frustrations completely." Confided the magician, placing his gloved hand around the man's shoulder. "She is a pretty young thing, and it would be a shame to keep her as just a head."

"I'll call the police!" The man declared shakily.

"You can call the President for all I care," Cosmo shrugged. "You won't remember anything that happens here, I'll make sure of it. But our lovely volunteer will certainly remember! That is the point after all, or my name isn't Cosmo the Conjuror!"

More cheers. He tapped his cane on the floorboards, and two lovely assistants appeared on stage. They were scantily clad in nothing more than a teddy, nylon stockings, and garter belts. They wheeled out a large glass case with a headless body inside. The body was completely nude. Taylor couldn't see whose body was in there from her vantage point, unable to turn her head or neck.

"Would you folks like to see Taylor's head attached to that body over there?" Cosmo juiced the audience, hearing peals of laughter and applause. "Would you like to see that person's head attached to Taylor Swift's body?"

Taylor gulped. Someone else was going to receive her body in exchange? She hoped it would be someone responsible, who wouldn't defile or abuse her body.

The assistants, with Taylor's enchanted boyfriend's help, hefted the body out of the case and onto an angled table. They fastened straps around the arms and legs.

"Without further ado: Presto-Change-o!" Cosmo shouted...

... and Taylor again fell asleep. When she awoke, everyone was gone and she was back on the Vegas strip, fully clothed with her head fixed atop of the body of...
1543311.title: Taylor Swift

154331111.content:
Taylor found herself standing in the middle of the street. It's daylight now, and several taxicabs honked at her as they swerved out of her way.

She looked around perplexed. In one hand she carried a soda can; in the other, a set of car keys. Her purse was gone, and the sheer black bodysuit she now wore didn't leave much to the imagination.

Taylor's body felt much heavier than before, and for good reason: Her tits and ass felt huge. Both felt enhanced by plastic surgery, and both strained against the fabric, causing them to jiggle whenever she walked. Her short, waspish figure was a stark difference from the lithe, slender figure she so diligently maintained through constant visits to the gym, the spa, and so on:

https://imgur.com/a/3JMTxPL

Her fingernails had long, fake beds attached to them, and her right shoulder featured a sleeve tattoo. Taylor never had so much ink in one place before.

"Hey, look!" A voice called out from the sidewalk. "Is that Taylor Swift??"

A nearby crowd immediately started clamouring for her. Taylor covered her face from the flashbulbs firing from the paparazzi, who seemed to converge upon her wherever she went.

She stumbled away from the crowd as best she could in her four-inch, peep-toe heels, almost twisting her ankle a couple times, fighting back tears as she ducked for cover into the alley behind the casino. It was the same place where she met the magician last night. But he was nowhere to be found now.

Breathing heavily, her shelf of a chest rising and falling with each breath, Taylor thought about what to do next. She had to get somewhere private in order to take stock of her new body and figure out a way to contact her boyfriend. Maybe he might remember what happened last night?

Taylor couldn't believe how slutty she looked. She would never be caught dead in public dressed like this, even if she had the body to go with it now.

She tucked her hair into a ponytail, using a scrunchie wrapped around her wrist, and pulled up her leggings so they would cover her asscrack:

https://imgur.com/h4L2Do4

Taylor minced into the casino, her bum wiggling rhythmically in her leggings as she went. She was toeing quite the 'caboose' back there, drawing the gobsmacked stares of casino patrons as she approached a clerk at the front counter.

"Good morning, Taylor!" Said the young man behind the counter. She could tell he was flummoxed by her new appearance, as he tried to stay professional and not train his eyes on her busty figure. "Great performance last night, by the way. How can we help you today?"

"I seem to have lost my cell phone and purse last night." She murmured truthfully. Along with her whole body, she inwardly thought. But she continued, "May I please use your phone to call for a pick up?"

The clerk handed her a phone and she dialed her boyfriend's number. He picked up instantly.

"Taylor? I've been calling you all morning but there was no answer. Where are you?" He asked, clearly concerned about her disappearance.

"I'll explain later. I'm back at the casino, can you pick me up in the back?" She implored. He said he would be there momentarily, and ten minutes later she climbed into the front passenger's seat of their tinted Mercedes.

He eyed her strangely as she hefted her buxom frame into the car and plopped her big ass onto the seat. He noticed that she fastened the seat belt snugly against her chest, cleaving her large boobs in two.

"Taylor... what happened to your body?" He asked.

"Do you remember everything that happened last night?" She asked him uneasily.

"Yeah, at least I think so. You had a concert, we had a heart-to-heart conversation afterwards, and then you wanted to be left alone." He said, apparently forgetting the encounter with the magician and the head swap.

So Taylor told him the whole story, how she met the magician named Cosmo the something-or-other and he whisked both of them onto his stage. How he had been enchanted to forget the magic show, and how she had been swapped onto this woman's body.

"I suppose it could have been much worse." Taylor finished her story, looking down at her knockers. She shifted in her seat, picking out the leggings which had again swallowed up into her new asscrack and vagina. "I need to change out of these clothes, slutty is not a good look for me."

"Agreed," Her boyfriend nodded. They pulled up to their hotel, and he escorted her into their room without anyone else seeing.

Taylor immediately stripped out of her bodysuit and leggings, disposing the garments in disgust, and searched through her luggage for more modest clothing. She bent over her bags, giving her boyfriend a good look at her full ass.

He coughed. She spun around, her boobs swaying as she did so. Her boyfriend nervously adjusted his trousers, fighting against a raging hard-on.

"Sorry," He said simply.

"It's okay..." Taylor said, covering her puffy nips with her hands. She quickly stepped into a pair of panties, but with her new waist size the poor fabric was stretched tightly across her butt, threatening to snap at any instant. She noted that her new body was freshly shaved 'down there,' wondering whether it has had sex recently.

"Looks like we'll have to buy some new clothes for you. Not much is going to fit, it seems." Her boyfriend stated, watching her struggle into a pair of jeans.

She's out of breath by the time she's done shimmying into them, pulling them up over her ass. "And I'll have to go to the gym twice as often to work off all of this junk in my trunk."

"I think it's kind of hot, actually." He admitted, still rocking a boner.

Taylor abandoned the idea of putting on one of her own bras, given the dramatic increase in cup size, and threw on one of her baggiest tops instead. The white cotton material stretching against her bust and not offering a whole lot of support:

But I do know that whoever owned this body most likely has my body now. That's what Cosmo said before he cast that spell, anyway."

1543311111.content:
Taylor Swift stayed inside her hotel room for the rest of the day, too mortified to leave and be noticed. She and her boyfriend ordered room service and watched a few films to pass the time. Ordinarily, she would have hit the clubs, visited her friends, or tried her hand at any number of gambling floors along the Strip. She only got to visit Las Vegas a few times each year and it was one of her favourite stops while out touring.

But the obvious problem was it wouldn't be her hand being dealt cards or inserting bills into a slot machine. It was this curvy, top-heavy woman's hand. Taylor refused to think of the body below her head as belonging to her.

Taylor looked at her fake nails and paced the room like a caged animal. Her wide hips prevented her from making the sort of graceful steps that captivated her audiences. Instead, her ass swayed in a sultry, hypnotic rhythm. Her hips pitched back and forth against her best efforts, her creamy thighs rubbing against each other as she walked back and forth. Gone was her poised glide, replaced instead with a sexy strut.

"Gah! This is horrible!" She squealed, falling back onto the bed and causing her boobs to bounce about wildly within her top. Everything felt so alien and different compared to her tall, slender figure.

Meanwhile, her boyfriend steps out of the bathroom, bringing the cell phone off his ear.

"Tay, that was Aidan Phillips," He said, referring to Taylor's manager. "The other band members have arrived in Los Angeles and are wondering when you will arrive. We need to get on the next flight as soon as possible. Otherwise, you might miss your next concert at the Hollywood Bowl."

Taylor had completely forgotten about her next scheduled performance. She was on tour, after all, debuting her newest album. Los Angeles was the biggest venue on her schedule, the single greatest opportunity to showcase her best songs and electrify tens of thousands of fans.

Tens of thousands of album-buying, merchandise-shopping, ticket-paying fans. If she didn't show up for the performance, it would be disastrous for her tour, and possibly cause her to get kicked off her record label deal by Aidan Phillips. That guy only took on the best disciplined singers; he was well known in the music industry for his short temper and high expectations.

"How long until the next performance?" Taylor asked uneasily.

Her boyfriend looked at his watch. "About six hours. We can still get there with time to spare, but we have to hurry."

"But...But I can't go out looking like THIS!" Taylor shrieked.

"You still look pretty hot," He replied. "Let's figure out how to get your body back later. Either way, Aidan is expecting you to be there tonight for the performance."

He left the room to check out of the hotel and arrange a limousine to transport them to the airport.

Taylor began pacing the room again... until she noticed a very interesting program running on the TV.

It was a brand new exclusive interview with Kim Kardashian... only Kim looked much different than Taylor remembered her!

***


This episode of Hollywood Insider began with a montage of the female socialite:

https://imgur.com/n069WY6

https://imgur.com/Out5S5u

https://imgur.com/XC3cQNB

Male Interviewer: If you've ever watched an episode of The Kardashian Fashion, you know all about Kim Kardashian! She has tens of millions of followers, millions of dollars of net worth, and a family that rivals royalty in terms of name recognition. Yes, this Queen of American reality television has done it all. Or has she?

https://imgur.com/nnvs1Vv

Taylor's stomach fell. "HEY! THAT'S MY BODY!!!"

Sure enough, Kim Kardashian could be seen pirouetting and posing on-screen wearing Taylor Swift's body below her head. The contrast was astonishing; Kim's darker skin tone against Taylor's milk-white skin colour. Kim's surgically enhanced cheekbones, nose, and waxed eyebrows against Taylor's natural body proportions. The seamless transition between her torso and neck. Her dick-sucking, bee stung lips sent an altogether different message from Taylor's girl-next-door figure below her head.

Kim: I've got a new lease on life! I feel years younger, full of energy, and ready to take on the world.

Male Interviewer: Take a seat, Kim. Oh my God, your legs look so slender and sexy! And have you gotten taller?

Kim: (laughs) I'd like to think the camera adds a few inches of height, Ryan.

Male Interviewer: When did you find the time to lose so much weight? You had just given birth to your second child last month... and congratulations, by the way! But usually it takes some time to get your body back into shape after going through something like that, doesn't it?

https://imgur.com/RJVQeWl

Taylor felt like throwing up. She had never experienced childbirth before, and yet here she was sporting a body that had recently gone through a second pregnancy. Her current body had carried another man's seed on two occasions. Her belly certainly had the stretch marks and spider veins to prove it, now.

Kim: (crossing her legs in her chair) I felt like I wanted to be a better mom to my children. Y'know, set a good example for them as they grow up by staying fit and active.

Male Interviewer: That's a noble goal, Kim, but how exactly did all of this happen? Because girl, send me the name of your plastic surgeon!

Kim: What you're looking at is all-natural. I've wanted to become a vegetarian for a long time, so I think I'll try that out and see where it goes?

Male Interviewer: What does your husband, the famous rapper Kanye West, think of your new figure? Speaking of him, you're not willing to take all meat off the menu, are you?

Kim: (licking her lips) Well... I think I could make an exception for him.

Just when Taylor thought it couldn't get any worse! Is she going to use Taylor's body to have sex with her husband? And Kanye West, of all people! The very person who Taylor Swift hated the most, professionally speaking. She remembered receiving an award at the 2009 Video Music Awards, only to be stood up by Kanye West himself on stage. At the critical moment, in front of millions of viewers, he snatched the microphone out of her hands and loudly disagreed with the decision. Even though he apologised for it later, the two haven't been on speaking terms since... and that extended to his wife, Kim Kardashian.

Male Interviewer: Let's talk about your exercise routine. What do you say to your millions of followers on Twitter and Instagram, who want to look as good as you?

Taylor turned off the TV in disgust. "That bitch stole my body and left me with her older, postpartum body!"

Just then, her boyfriend re-entered the hotel room and announced they were ready for check out. Taylor filled him in on the news and what she witnessed on the TV.

After listening to her story, he rubbed his chin. "Wow. So that's Kim Kardashian's body? I thought that tattoo looked familiar."

She stared daggers at him, so he coughed. "I mean... look on the positive side, Taylor. Now we know whose body you have. All we have to do is track her down and find some way to switch you two back to normal. She might know more about that magical act from the night before. Maybe she was the one who arranged it in the first place?"

"But what about tonight's performance in Los Angeles?" She asked.

"You can still perform tonight," He reassured her, rubbing her shoulder affectionately. "You still have your wonderful voice. Plus, we can just ask for a lot of smoke on the stage and to dim the lights a bit. That way, most fans won't be able to see your body clearly. Some people in the front rows will, of course, but we might be able to play it off like you've put on weight recently."

"I suppose I have, haven't I?" Taylor asked, dejectedly, as she stared down at her gigantic boobs, pudgy belly, and childbearing hips.

He stood up and grabbed her hand. "Now come on. I booked the first flight out of here to L.A. Our limousine is waiting outside."

Taylor threw her now ill-fitting clothing into her suitcase and left the room, her boyfriend leading the way.

1. The focus is on head swaps. Yes, headless is allowed, but it should only be temporary until the character head finds a new body.
2. All bodies are applicable: male, female, animal, robot, etc.
3. Males can be put in swap-nanigans, but again, the focus is on the ladies.
4. No sex between those whose bodies are related. But sex between the heads of two who are related is okay as long as their bodies are not of the same family.
5. Conjoinment is allowed, as long as at least one of the shared body's heads is different from the body.
6. Pictures of head swaps are not necessary, but they are recommended.

Have fun!
info.pretty_title: Fictional and Famous Female Head Swaps
